title: Incident chronic kidney disease in relation to later-life exposure to PM
abstract: Accumulating evidence has linked ambient fine particulate matter (PM A nationwide CKD-free cohort of 6438 participants aged 45 years and above were enrolled from 125 cities across China's mainland and followed up from 2011 to 2015.
